input: With reference to the conduct of government business in the Parliament of India, the term ‘closure’ refers to

options.A: suspension of debate at the terminatan of a day’s sitting of the Parliament
options.B: a rule of legislative procedure under which further debate on a motion can be halted
options.C: the termination of a Parliamentary session
options.D: refusal on the part of tie Government to have the opposition look at important documents

explanation: “Closure” is one of the means by which a debate may be brought to a close by a majority decision of the House, even though all members wishing to speak have not done so.
